website_summaries.verdict: The Oppo BDP-93 is a universal disc player with 3D support, which offers excellent video quality, but there are cheaper options out there.

customer_reviews.title: Best bluray and dvd player
customer_reviews.text: Do a little reaseach. I wont be the best guy to tell you that there is simply not any other unit that can show a bluray like this. There is a little delay time for loading of ejecting that is corrected on a firmware update. Since the player is wireless you get updates and even DLNA over the air! GREAT with also fantastic quality! It's not region free from factory but if you just type oppo bdp-83 region free you'll find a software to download or buy the cable, open the unit and easily install it in 5 minutes to make region free. GO FOR IT
customer_reviews.author: Julio A M Neto

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Realizing that I have paid 2-1/2 times what I had just paid for an equivalent Samsumg, I should not feel this way. However, execution is key. Fulfilling the features and attributes which a machine is suppose to have, is why we buy them. Thus the Samsung is worthless, and this OPPO is invaluable. The other reviews pointed out its build quality, packaging, features, included items as great attributes and I can only agree. Thus far there is no fault with this product, and I am a proud owner. I also look forward to taking advantage of the expanded compatible formats avaialble with this machine such as SACD, etc. Enjoy yours.
customer_reviews.author: moviephile

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Universal Player
customer_reviews.text: Having had a couple of universal players previously that were supposed to be good ones, I didn't expect to see and especially hear the difference with this new Oppo. I not only use this player for DVD's and Bluray's but also as a player for CD's and SACD's and the upgrade soundwise was dramatic, I could hear a cleaner fuller sound. The picture quality is as good as I've seen anywhere and the look and quality feel of this player is superb. My LCD TV is not 3D so I can't comment on that aspect. I use it to download Netflix movies over my wireless system using the wireless dongle that accompanies the player, and it works beautifully. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: rich58b

customer_reviews.title: Great Blu Ray player!
customer_reviews.text: I started with a Sony Blu Ray, then moved onto a Samsung Blu Ray and had mixed results (some disc did NOT play, others skipped and load times were gruelling). This unit out of the box fires up and performs! All of my problem discs in the past play perfect, the picture seems better and the sound is also improved. The set up menu is easy and the instructions are also complementary to the ease of understanding experience when setting the parameters for your configuration. It was expensive, but in the past I got what i paid for. Same for this unit. Even the packaging will impress most - the presentation starts when you open the box...
customer_reviews.author: Richard P

customer_reviews.title: Oppo BDP-93 via HDMI for music
customer_reviews.text: I compared the audio quality of my BDP-93 for music with that of my Sony XA5400ES, using HDMI from both to my Cary Cinema 11a. At first I thought the sound of the 5400ES distinctly superior, but when I connected the audio from the BDP-93 directly to the 11a, bypassing a video processor, the sound was equally excellent. The sound from the BDP-93 seems a bit warmer, the XA5400ES a bit drier. But the BDP-93 plays nearly everything, and I've discovered the joy of HDCD recordings. Operas on Blu-ray can be a delight with the BDP-93.
customer_reviews.author: dbphd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: With this player you will NEVER have to worry about Sony's Cinavia..!
customer_reviews.author: T.Barry

customer_reviews.title: OPPO BDP-93 Blu-ray Disc Player
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large standard DVD collection of movies/shows of the 30's, 40's and 50's. The up conversion of my DVDs are the best I have ever seen with this player and the sound is very good. This is a very well built machine. 1st class all the way. Has a very nice large back light remote. I do not care for 3D and I do not stream movies/shows and I do not have any Blu-ray DVDs, so I cannot comment on those items. I have no regrets buying this player. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Q Public

customer_reviews.title: The best Blu-ray player ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two players knowing it will play any format out there. I have a Sony 4k 65" TV in my media room and this player plays 4k movies that are incredible, I also have a DVD form Japan in a pal format and it plays it when other players do not. with wired and wireless internet it updates itself. Can't ask for anything easer than that. I did my homework and this is one of the best of the best. I would recommend this to anyone who wants high end quality.
customer_reviews.author: King_George269

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Pretty pleased with this blu-ray player so far. Can't comment on 3-D function, don't have a 3-D TV. Picture quality is superb on my Panny 50 inch plasma. On-screen menus are fairly straight forward. Only difficulty I've experienced is the internet connection, even with the included extended internet unit. Suspect my network access point is still too distant for a reliable connection, so it may not be a defect with the equipment. I must commend Oppo on their packing. Never saw an electronic component packed so well, even my plasma TV wasn't protected like this player.
customer_reviews.author: outlaw164

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't support Netflix subtitles
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is very good. It's quick for a BD player, but not by DVD player standards. Takes a few seconds to boot, during which it flashes the splash screen three times. Response to remote key-presses is leisurely. Only big problem I've found is lack of support for Netflix subtitles. Oppo tech support says that's the way it is and will stay until they can get the firmware updated from the Netflix 2.1 interface protocol to the 3.0 version, which supports subtitles and different audio programs. Oppo doesn't know when, or even if, that will happen.
customer_reviews.author: jim in Carmel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid performance. Handles all discs with aplomb. I've burned some avi files to data discs and it effortlessly loads them up and plays back with quality that resembles DVD. OS is easy to understand -- except for getting netflix to stream. That took a little doing. I don't recall what the hang up was; I think I had to search the Oppo site to find out how to enter the netflix registration number in. Documentation is nil. (and if anyone knows how to get the BD to talk to my Mac via the wifi network, I'd love to know about it) Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: jm808

customer_reviews.title: Top box!
customer_reviews.text: Five hundred bucks is considerably more than I intended to spend on a black box to play DVDs, but I made the decision based on the near-flawless user responses across the web. Not only does it have a raft of features, they all work the first time with no 'fiddling' and they work beautifully. Rather than a load of gimmicks that delivers only frustration, this is a unit that understates and overproves. It is the standard by which other players should be judged - the Top Box.
customer_reviews.author: LeRoque

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Blue Ray DVD players on the market. After having a Samsung HT-C7530W blue ray player that could not play half of the new Blue Ray releases and even music audio CDs, I decided to spend the money on the Oppo player. And what a great decision this has been. The player is easy to operate; works seamlessly with the Samsung HT-C7530W surround sound; plays all the movies and audio CDs that the Samsung device could not read. One of the great things about Oppo is that the company has thought about all the small details by even including batteries for the remote control, a wireless adapter, and an HDMI cable.
customer_reviews.author: Socrates

customer_reviews.title: OPPO BDP93 and OPPO BDP83
customer_reviews.text: I own both the OPPO BDP83 and the OPPO BDP93 (which arrived a few days ago). It is hard to believe that these two machines can upgrade old movies to a fantastic level. I also want to commend OPPO on their tech-savvy customer service reps (especially a young man named JAMES). Every time I've called, I always get correct advice without any hassles. I definitely would recommend any OPPO product because of their flawless engineering know-how and excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary McQuiston

customer_reviews.title: Oppo BDP-93
customer_reviews.text: This DVD-CD player is everything the reviews say. I used it to replace 2 Samsung BlueRay players. I have to say it was a 100% improvement on video and sound quality was much better. Thought Id keep this review short. So I would purchase this one unless you want alittle more quality buy the 95 then. This is the econd Oppo I've owned, and the 5year old one is still going strong(not a Blue Ray). Still after a year this is a great player, but if you want even better sound its time to whip out the big bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Rookieracer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It goes like this "you get what you pay for" and this player is worth the cost. I replaced a Panasonic bd-35 and the difference is night and day. I'm using the Oppo with a 58" Panny V10 on THX settings with Onkyo 876 rec on pass through. The picture is so crisp and clear with the color rendition spot-on. I used the Spears & Munsil HD benchmark disc and the Oppo with the Panny were spot on for color and gamma. Im looking forward to many years of watching movies at home.
customer_reviews.author: HiBro

customer_reviews.title: Don't have a smart TV? get a SMART Bluray player!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Blueray player. but to be honest I use its streaming feature more than the actual Blueray player itself. It has internet access to netflix and a few others. However the real nice feature of either playing a movie from a usb drive or streamed over my network is to me its best feature. IT will up convert any dvd to 1080p and the quality is exceptional. This player is not the cheapest by far, however the feature set is untouchable.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Best around
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oppo to replace a aging denon blu ray player and have been totally satisfied with it. The sound and video are both just a good as you have heard or read on the internet. It may seem like a lot for a blu ray player since you can get one for about $100 bucks nowadays but they will not perform like this one. If you are serious about home theater then this is the player for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but bought it a few months too soon
customer_reviews.text: I am not a connesuier (can't even spell that) of blu ray players, but this seems to live up to its hype as the top of the line. It's a hefty piece of equipment as some players seem to weigh only ounces. We use it with a Panasonic Viera plasma and view 3D on it from time to time and the whole setup works great. My only regret is that shortly after I purchased it Oppo came out with a new model (for the same price) that made this one obsolete.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Javaman

customer_reviews.title: The total package
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. Of course it plays dvds and blu rays, but why I really bought it was to play movies through my flash drive. I have a lot of movies and shows on my computer. I now just transfer them over to either my flash drive or my 5 year old 100gb WD passport and plug them into the OPPO. The oppo has played every format movie i have, from avi to mp4's that are dvd quality, 720p or even 1080p. What a beast. Could use a cooler looking home screen though
customer_reviews.author: Orbital

customer_reviews.title: love in a box.
customer_reviews.text: other than just repeating the glowing reviews for this remarkable machine, i would simply say that based on the way the product was packed and the inclusion of cables and other hardware and the completeness of the instruction manual, this OPPO company truly loves what they're doing. most other electronic corporations could take a hint from OPPO and show a little love to their customers. for $500.00 this player is an absolute bargain!
customer_reviews.author: E. T. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic player
customer_reviews.text: Plays everything, and in great quality! And with a small PCB you can buy at other sites (from Denmark) you can make it easily region free: DVD and BD. The funny thing is that when you put that region free PCB inside, you realize the quality it is build if: nice separate PCBs inside for audio, video, mechanics and the power. This is how electronics should be build, as you know from that: this must be a great player.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch Andre in the US

customer_reviews.title: Well Built and solid...sound is spectacular.  DVD video upscaling is just wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this Blu-ray player is hard to beat - feature-wise. The price is a bit high but then again you definitely get what you pay for. Great support - the player notifies me when there are firmware updates. Menu screens are simple and easy to use. I have owned the Oppo BDP-93 for 2 years - no issues. Areas for improvements: Need to add Amazon Instant Video, boot time could be a little faster (mostly with blu-ray movies), power-up and startup times could be a little faster as well. These are all minor as I see the same issues with the newer models from Panasonic and Samsung (I like to test these things at Best Buy and Sears).
customer_reviews.author: Socaldude

customer_reviews.title: Video and Audio Machine
customer_reviews.text: Another review to praise the OPPO BDP-93 PROS: GREAT Remote... Excellent picture quality and 3-D... Two HDMI out, I like this feature. One to the TV and one to the AVReceiver...Includes a very good manual... Definitely packed to arrive intact... And last but not least, this deck plays my DVD-A Audio disks, SACD, and Blu-ray Audio Disks. Makes this a prominent piece in my Stereo System as well as my Home Theater. CONS: I am not a big fan of flush mount controls on the face of the machine. If the room is not well lit, these little features can be a little hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: User Review of Oppo
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as if new. Performs playing CDs and DVDs very well. Latest firmware came installed. Able to use Pandora for music. Use HDMI for display and analog stereo for sound. Both outstanding at default settings. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: stephenkarkos

customer_reviews.title: Stellar
customer_reviews.text: As many others have said, this is the only blu-ray player to purchase. It does everything right and does it right away. If all products were this excellent, the world would be a better, more carefree place.
customer_reviews.author: Scott DeMoss

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment For a Player!
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality and performance. Love how they keep up with firmware updates for compatibility long term as well! Well, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: Oppo is simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Oppo Blu-Ray Player that I have purchased and for good reason. The build quality is incredible. This is one very well made component! Also the load spped and ease of use makes this a super value for the money. The people at Oppo are great with their customer support and all of my contacts with the company have been nothing but positive. I recommend this palyer with 5 star confidence. You will not be disappointed. Excellent value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph J. Shenyo

customer_reviews.title: Top of the Line Blu-Ray player
customer_reviews.text: This was one of those items in life we don't really have to have but really want. There are many economical Blu-Ray players that operate just fine. That being said I decided to splurge and go for top of the line. Glad I did. The picture is supurb on my new Sharp 60" 240hz 3D TV. I bought this to replace my Sony Blu-Ray player that was one of the first Blu-Ray players on the market and probably cost just as much 5 or 6 years ago, what a difference. Definetly worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: bobby to much

customer_reviews.title: Great product and probably the best player sold for the money
customer_reviews.text: It has been giving me good service for quite a while with no problems. Oppo customer service is the best out there today. What service should be! Other bluray players wish they could be this good. This is not my first oppo product.
customer_reviews.author: Schreck

customer_reviews.title: This is a great blu ray dvd player
customer_reviews.text: I bought it used but worth it. No cinavia copy block. Plays many types of video audio files quality inside and out
customer_reviews.author: Donald Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Oppo 93
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Blu Ray player on the market for the price. Excellant picture and sound and it can play all CDs, DVDs, Blu Ray, 3D and you can stream movies from the internet. I bought the first generation Oppo when it came out a couple of years ago, and when this current model came out I sold the other player and up graded to this model Oppo 93. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RABLS2

customer_reviews.title: best player
customer_reviews.text: have owned for almost a yr, works great love all the features, looked up all the reviews and did my home work and this was the best choice. In this day in age you get what you pay for, you buy a cheap player you'll get a piece of junk, its better to spend a little more and get a higher quality device and thats what the oppo BDP-93 is! Have told my friends and family and they are all on the oppo wagon and love their BDP-93.
customer_reviews.author: Kastillo

customer_reviews.title: Oppo BDP-93 DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: The Oppo BDP-93 is an awesome dvd player. I had read serveral reviews and want to find out for myself. I have a samsung 3600 dvd player which is a great dvd player. However, the Oppo gives a new meaining to blue ray with its excellent video play. I love the remote control and it is user friendly. The added features with internet streamimg keep and netflix motivated me to puchased the dvd player. I am waiting for them to add pandora to the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: It cost more for a reason
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many Blu Ray players and yes, they basically all look and do the same thing. I decided to try the OPPO brand out as I had heard so much about them. I am impressed and you can tell this player is built well just by picking it up. I am very pleased with this player.
customer_reviews.author: Michael0924

customer_reviews.title: Keeper
customer_reviews.text: Not much can be said that has not already been said. At this juncture I will not need anything more advanced. The internet capabilities are not as fast as my Roku or Apple TV but those devices cannot compare with the quality of the audio and video of this device when it comes to CD, SACD, DVD, Blu-Ray, and Blu Ray 3d. Nothing can, really!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bedford

customer_reviews.title: Great universal player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my aging Yamaha DVD-C750, I found the audio on DVD-a and SACD's just a bit more detailed than the Yamaha especially in the mid-range, very subtle but noticeable when listening intensely. This is un-scientific however, I didn't do blind testing or switching to come up with my findings, I just listened to audio I'm very familiar with. I am using the 7.1 analog out instead of the HDMI since my pre-amp is not HDMI capable. Video is great although I'm more an audio buff than video, I'll leave the video to someone else. This player is rock solid and should last many years,
customer_reviews.author: Tom Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best home theater investment ...will play anything...made before Cinavia ruling...untouchable
customer_reviews.author: William C. Trussell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Player w/ Good Features
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with the purchase. I use both HDMI outputs, one directly connected to the TV and one for audio only. Picture quality is outstanding for BluRay's as well as DVD upscaling. Sound quality is pretty impressive too. I use the LAN cable for accessing online content. HD Netflix movies look close to DVD quality (can't tell the difference honestly). One complaint is the lack of Pandora and Slacker but I am using my MP3 player for that so no big issue. The player looks very well built and materials are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ozbey

customer_reviews.title: The Oppo BDP-93 Blu-ray Disc Player is superb!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I would have wanted to say about this unit has already been said. I'm just backing up a great product that has turned my 700+ DVD collection into a blu-ray collection. It does an amazing job of converting your regular DVD's into VERY high quality HD-DVD's when put up on the screen. You won't go wrong buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rocketshipjack

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: It's all been said in earlier reviews. My advice is not to hesitate, but to buy this now if you are in the market for a Blu-ray player and willing to spend just a bit more than the cost of basic models. For that small price premium, you will get a high-quality component that will replace every disc player you own.
customer_reviews.author: HWAG

customer_reviews.title: OPPO service is great
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews detail the technical brilliance of the OPPO BDP-93 and it is an incredible value. My story starts at 8:30PM Friday evening when my picture started flickering. I tried a variety of fixes including trying multiple movies and rebooting. Nothing worked. In desperation I called the service number, and late on a Friday night a tech answered, and immediately solved my problem. How anyone could rate their service below five stars eludes me.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.EBP

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before purchasing this. As all the other reviews atest to: It is definitely an impressive device Great video and audio capabilities. Several nice extras, good build quality, nice looking, adequate I/o. Would definately highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DrStewie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: We now own both an Oppo region free DVD player and this one. Both are superior to other DVD/Blu-Ray players. Love the features, the upscaling, and the picture. If you want the best Blu-ray player out there, this is the one for you!
customer_reviews.author: E. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: First expereince of OPPO as a company so a little unsure what to expect but after some online research decided the quality, spec and price was right for what I was after. First impressions out of the box was a quality product, seemed solidly built and simple uncluttered design. Don't know if I missed this in the product specs but it came with a wireless ethernet connector for the rear USB slot. This allows me to view Netflix and other online systems through the player, nice touch. On viewing (Art of flight blu ray) I was really pleased with picture quality and remote is pretty simple to use. Bottom line is a hearty recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lambonl

customer_reviews.title: OPPO has set the bar high
customer_reviews.text: When it's time to get that Blu-ray player go with OPPO. The BDP-93 is the older version but can still play any disk I put in. I haven't tried 3D because I don't have a 3D TV. Network gives you access to Netflix HD, Pandora and a few others.
customer_reviews.author: GT Rojek

customer_reviews.title: It's great, but you'll have to buy the newer model now.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I never wrote a review about this unit, it's long since been discontinued. In short it's audio and video qualities are excellent and it will play any kind of disc you throw at it (well, no LP's). I use it for both home theater and two channel audio. The only way you can better this Oppo is with one of their more expensive models, great company, great products. I don't even remember how long I've owned it, but it's always worked perfectly. I'll probably replace it when I need to play something like a UHD Blu-ray (or whatever they decide to call them), and I'm sure it will be anothe Oppo.
customer_reviews.author: AudioHTIT

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: The first thing anyone should realize before purchasing is that with an hdmi cable, the bluray picture quality will be identical with any player, regardless of price. the advantage of this player is with the standard def upscaling, build quality and codec compatability. whether this is worth the premium price is up to the individual. personally i am very happy with it and feel it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: oppo bdp-93
customer_reviews.text: It's a shame we have to spend this much before any company can get it right, and they did. picture is excellent and stays that way even when switching from widescreen to full screen (16.9) fit, retaining sharpness and image proportion (no elongated or stretched people). I haven't used streaming yet so you'll have to read other reviews for that. audio is excellent also, with 7.1 dolby sound. hookups - analog-with separate connections for all 7.1 channels, digital outlets-coaxial, optical, 2 hdmi's. even the packaging is impressive. users manual is easy to read and understand. it's 85 pages long with lots of graphics to describe what they mean.
customer_reviews.author: ryan stoneridge

customer_reviews.title: OPPO love affair
customer_reviews.text: I have a high end stereo with many components in the thousands. Can no longer afford stuff like this. I ordered a Panasonic plyer to save money. After reading reviews of the OPPO I dectded to cancel the order and pay the $499. Best move ever. The OPPO would be a good deal at $5000. It has incredible looks and build. All of the features are much better than I dreamed. I am not at all into streaming from internet. Even the cds sound much better. The blu ray is gorgeous and the regular dvds are almost hi def. Sacds sound great. I am thrilled with the OPPO!!
customer_reviews.author: Conrad J.

customer_reviews.title: oppo deal
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at OPPO BR players for several months when thsi model came out at a very affordable price point. It's all that I expected and more for the money. Highly recommend to spend a few extra bucks to get Oppo quality.
customer_reviews.author: BigBlock

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I can only add to the accolades already described in the other reviews. This is a great player and I haven't even begun to use all of its features. Watching a Blu-ray disc on this player really demonstrates how poor the "HD" cable signal really is. Its also nice to have a player from a company dedicated to making them and therefore focused on ensuring that it has timely firmware updates. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Hank from Chicago

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: very nice piece..it's a little pricey but in the end it is well worth it..you can do a ton of stuff on it..you have all your usual internet things like net flix, pandora, vudu..etc..I am not much of a techy..so I know there's alot more I can get out of it..
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Home theater taken to next level1
customer_reviews.text: I was totaly floored by the improvement of audio performance of the Oppo BDP-93 vs my Samsung BDC 6500. I am hearing sounds of my blu ray disc that were not part of the aural texture before. The clearity of details in the blu ray video has improved slightly. I truly have a home theater to be reckoned with. Thanks OPPO. Thanks to the previous reviews on this site that gave me the confidence to make this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Howard

customer_reviews.title: Why settle for less?
customer_reviews.text: Superior design, engineering, build, and customer service for those who care about such things. If you want the best, don't fiddle about with lesser brands.
customer_reviews.author: Benchracer

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3D movies
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent machine with a lot of great features on it. Very easy to use and friendly, the pictures are so clear especially when watching 3D. I was very impressed with quality of the pictures, great brand for such a very affortable price.
customer_reviews.author: jxmai

customer_reviews.title: OPPO BDP-93
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic disc player. I was using a PS3, but I bought this to use instead. It is amazing! The load times are very fast, the picture quality is fantastic, and I'm playing my SACDs again. Can't say enough good things about this player. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Fletch

customer_reviews.title: Great feel from the start
customer_reviews.text: Just got my oppo bd93 today. Right off the bat, the packaging makes it look expensive and high-end. It's played everything so far, excessively well. Tried 3D quickly and it looked great. You won't be disppointed ;)
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Best Blu-ray player one can buy except for the 500
customer_reviews.text: Best Blu-ray player one can buy except for the 500.00 model, which is more designed for the audiophile listener. Produces great video and sound.
customer_reviews.author: R. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best BD player on the market. You get what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Buxton

customer_reviews.title: As others have stated, Top Notch product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Oppo BDP-93 to replace my 2 year old Sony that refused to play blu rays after doing a firmware update. I got the "invalid"/"cannot read disk" errors which seem all to common with Sony. In short, awesome packaging, quality build and feel, extremely easy setup, and fantastic picture and sound. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought the BDP-93 after using a Panasonic Blu ray player and there is a noticeable difference in picture quality. It's being used with a 50" Panasonic VT20 (VT25) plasma and the picture is amazing. Motion is excellent, no judder. Upscaling is very good too, a significant improvement on my Denon 1940 upscaling DVD player. Build quality is excellent, it feels like a very solid unit. Lastly, the player was extremely well packed. Overall I am very happy with my purchase and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: BEST BLU RAY PLAYER , LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I AM VERY IMPRESSED WITH THIS PLAYER, TRAY IN SOLID AND FAST, EASY TO TAKE DISC IN/OUT OF. THE VIDEO AND AUDEO ARE THE BEST IVE EVER SEEN OR HEARD. UPCONVERSION IS THE BEST, LOTS BETTER THEN MY LAST PLAYER, A LG 590. BLU RAY LOADS AND PLAYS FAST, USB WIRELESS IS WONDERFUL, GREAT MACHINE!!
customer_reviews.author: RLM

customer_reviews.title: Oppo BDP-93
customer_reviews.text: Nice blu-ray player and network streamer...universal voltage (great for overseas buyers), no hassle with stepdown transformer..automatic firmware upgrade as soon as connected to network-very impressive. Great picture and sound quality, dual hdmi output! Good quality package, hdmi cable provided. Only thing I didn't like was that player couldn't "see" my NAS so I had to install media server (TVersity fixed the problem!) Overall, very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: 035pop

customer_reviews.title: a remote fix
customer_reviews.text: if you dont like to have to point the remote at the player change the batterys to eveready ultimit lithium. then you can point the remote anywhere in the room. i am able to point it at the screen , the ceiling , the walls the floor and the unit responds perfectly. i found this out when the included carbon zinc batterys that were included stopped working and i replacewd them with the ultiment lithium batterys that i use exclusifly in all my equipment and flashlites. hope this helps. this is for the oppo bdp93.
customer_reviews.author: lennmoab

customer_reviews.title: What a machine!  Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth every penny! I have a very high end sound system and this player is absolutely awesome! Don't even hesitate on buying this if you're thinking of doing so!
customer_reviews.author: Scotty J

customer_reviews.title: blu-ray smoke!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my blu-ray player since January! best picture and audio for the money. built like a "tank"! blows away my playstation 3 and my panasonic blu-ray players. stop reading and just buy one!
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Koepp

customer_reviews.title: Forget any other DVD players
customer_reviews.text: This is a great DVD player. 2 HDMI outs Ethernet port Turns on and loads a Blue-ray so fast no waiting. The picture is great. Have had about two months and it has not froze, skipped or missed a beat. I have not used the 3D so I have no comment for that feature. From the time you open the box and see how it is packaged till the end of the movie you will be impressed with this DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: Trettin

customer_reviews.title: Great Player
customer_reviews.text: Have had this player for a few weeks an enjoy this very much, audio and video are great. Readed a few reviews that the load times and door open/close are slow, they are just as fast as other players, Hit the button and door opens in two to three seconds, Seems like the load time is faster than the panisonic I have when I play avitar. Have had no problems as of yet and expect none.
customer_reviews.author: WildNut

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good player. I purchased several years ago, and it is working fine in my home theater.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Contino

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped it would be...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and rock solid performance. I especially like the fast Blu-ray load time. Regular DVDs look great, too. There's a reason almost every review is positive for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Virgo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have had this player for 2 weeks. Set uo was intuitive, wireless net adapter worked, 3D is exceptional, sound excellent (using a yamaha receiver RX-V667.) Packaging was excellent. This is a quality product and for the price should replace a CD player (unless you have a changer)
customer_reviews.author: lovetoplay

customer_reviews.title: OPPO BDP-93 - A truly amazing player
customer_reviews.text: The reviews speak for themselves. I have 2 BDP-83's which are amazing. Hard to believe they actually rose the bar to perfection. $500 is actually cheap when comparing the quality to other players. The sound is mind blowing!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent DeNardo

customer_reviews.title: Oppo BDP-93
customer_reviews.text: Very good product with all promises met. I selected this product after hours of online research. Great choice of Media compatibility and internet streaming. Vision and sound in brilliant. Only issue is that the menu is a little slow between choices, but that is a very minor issue. I am very fussy and this product get 5 stars from me. Save yourself some time ..... just buy it if you are after the best
customer_reviews.author: Ez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, I am very pleased with the quality of this product. I highly recommend it to others. A+ +
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, I am very pleased with the quality of this product. I highly recommend it to others. A+ +
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ranson

customer_reviews.title: Oppo BDB-93
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent players in all formats. BD quality is outstanding, and the upgrade from standard def. DVD works very well. Audio quality on CDs is excellent as well. I'm using the analog stereo outputs to drive my vintage McIntosh C-32/ MC2105. The sound is fantastic. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Vestal

customer_reviews.title: OPPO rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It supports multiple types of sound systems and works fantastic right out of the box. I highly recommend this player for those seeking compatibility and reliability.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Oppo is the best!
customer_reviews.text: All the other lengthy reviews helped a lot. I've got 2 Oppo's now and got rid of the rest. 'nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Crusader

customer_reviews.title: OPPO BD-93 Universal player
customer_reviews.text: Purchased several months ago from Amazon. Usual terrific service from order through delivery. Amazon always a pleasure. Can't say enough about the 93. All the accolades apply from packing to set-up and use. I have had several other quality players over the years but none can hold a candle to the OPPO! From construction craftmanship, professional feel, and downright "eye-candy" great appearence, it is a beauty. Did I mention the audio/video performance? Wow, top notch video and sound that are noticably ahead of the competition. The solid "thunk" of the door/tray and the whisper quiet operation also let you know you have something special. If you can find a better machine at any reasonable price, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: t c keister

customer_reviews.title: OPPO Blu-Ray
customer_reviews.text: Video and Audio performance is excellent - wireless connectivity needs to be greatly improved, the USB wireless adapter is pretty slow and makes even streaming SD video iffy. Initial boot-up is a blind process the user is in the dark to what is going on for quite a few seconds, it would be good to have something on-screen to indicate that something really is 'going on' like "please wait". navigating the various functions should be more clearly intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Henry P Gregor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: For the price you won't be disappointed. Easy to setup and the picture is fantastic. It is worth every penny I paid for and more. I would consider buying a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: OPPO Blu ray player
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality and a wonderful product design. The only drawback that i can think of for this product in the lack of build in wireless connectivity. The adapter is quite bulky and doesn't fit with the rest of the design. Other than that it has been the best DVD/ Blu-Ray player that i have owned.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and outstanding customer support
customer_reviews.text: You're getting three outstanding products with Oppo; A great video and music player, and second to none customer support. Every inquiry I've made were all responded to in under 24 hours including weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Best BR DVD player- not best streaming internet player, yet
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding! Amazing! Perfect picture and sound, Worth every penny. The packaging, remote and set-up are as good as it gets. I love it and would give six stars if I could, but... The streaming internet qualities are behind apple and sony. The interface for youtube and netflix are so poor that I'm developing a conspiracy theory that they only want you to use Vudu and Pandora, which work great. The netflix and youtube are not easy to navigate. Reminds me of computing on MS-Dos. If you don't type exactly the right thing their is no hope. And the typing is slow and difficult. Good news...It can be fixed with a firmware update. Come on Oppo, I'm ready.
customer_reviews.author: Waviator

customer_reviews.title: Best Blu Ray Player For The Money
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Bluray player out there for the money. It is built like a tank. It has amazing audio and video quality. Super easy to use and Oppo has great tech support. Other manufacturers should be taking notes from Oppo.
customer_reviews.author: Spur Darren

customer_reviews.title: Unmatched Oppo Performance
customer_reviews.text: Going on a month now and I love My Oppo 93 player. Video in 1080p is crazy clear. Never had a player that was so smooth in operation and quick to load. Makes all My DVDs look better as well. A little more money than some players but worth every penny.

customer_reviews.title: No competition
customer_reviews.text: I compared it to my Panasonic, and the difference in picture quality was amazing. Smoothed out all the saw-tooth edges and took away blur and fuzziness. Sound quality very good. Postage to Australia was economical and much faster than I expected.

customer_reviews.title: I've auditioned many disc players. This is the best.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best CD SACD DVD Blu-Ray disc player that I have encountered. Extraordinary fidelity. Quick to load.

customer_reviews.title: Oppo BDP-93 Blu-Ray Disc Player review
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted an Oppo for quite a while. When I decided the time was right for a Blu-Ray Player, I was tempted by the Panasonic at $129 from Costco. I decided that I shouold get what I really wanted and bought the Oppo. This thing is really great! Plays everything, loads fast, and it just works. My Cd's sound much better, too. Mark Twitchell

customer_reviews.text: This Blueray has very good sound. A great picture. And is made well. I loved the network connection it aloud me to access NetFlicks

customer_reviews.text: What a great piece of equipment. It performs flawlessly and the unit is solidly built. Well worth the extra $.

customer_reviews.title: I love my OPPO Player
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying using of our new OPPO Blue Ray+ player. So far so good. Worth the money. I have not had any problems with the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jane B. Lew

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Blu-Ray
customer_reviews.text: Accepts many digital formats and play from PC, Memory stick, wireless and Internet. The only downfall is the two terabyte limit. The only workable fix for more than a 2 TB HDD limit is to use a desktop or laptop and have the HDD connected through the PC. Then to connect to the Internet, PC and Blu-ray requires a router. Use a Cat-5 cable if possible. Wireless is very limited in data transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: OPPO-zed
customer_reviews.text: I returned a Pioneer Blu-ray player to purchase this model based on a recommendation. I should have kept the Pioneer. This is VERY slow to load and has to be hard booted occasionally. It may have superior audio but the video is no better than the Pioneer in my view.

customer_reviews.title: oppo 3D blue ray disk player-93
customer_reviews.text: I had a playstation 3 only to watch movies.I had a yellow light on it and replace for this oppo.The palystation was good but this is fantastic.Seems I am watching a full lcd tv set(I use a sony 50 pearl projector).I am very happy with this oppo.It is a shame I live in Brasil because here we do not have Netflix or Blocbuster on demand.I hope in the future I will have this both streeming movies and shows.
customer_reviews.author: Luiz A. Alves Nunes

customer_reviews.title: oppo blu-ray player
customer_reviews.text: Awesome unit, everything I hoped for. Quality player at a an excellent price. Perfect for movies or music. Very happy.

customer_reviews.title: what a difference
customer_reviews.text: Had been using a $99 LG dvd player, heard about this and decided to give it a try. We watched the opening scenes of Ironman with the LG then the oppo. We could not believe the difference between the picture quality and sound quality. Its well worth the money if you have a good system. I kick myself for not getting it sooner This has taken my home theater to a new level.

customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers already said it all. A truly awesome BD player for both music and movie. I love it and will buy another one for a friend later this month
customer_reviews.author: Mikephoto

product_meta.title: OPPO BDP-93 Universal Network 3D Blu-ray Disc Player
product_meta.description:
Oppo's BDP-93 gives you universal playback of Blu-ray, DVD, CD, SACD, DVD-Audio, and a wealth of digital files, with solid picture and sound quality no matter the format. With access to streaming content from Netflix on Demand, USB and eSATA ports for your external drives, and wide connectivity including dual HDMI 1.4, this player defines versatility.Output : Analog Audio: 7.1ch, 5.1ch, or stereo, Digital Audio: Coaxial, Optical. HDMI Audio: Stereo, up to 7.1ch high-resolution PCM, up to 5.1ch DSD, bitstream or LPCM conversion of Dolby Digital, Dolby Digital Plus, Dolby TrueHD, DTS, DTS-HD High Resolution Audio, and DTS-HD Master Audio.Analog Video: Composite, Component Video (Y/Pb/Pr, 480i/480p, 720p/1080i available for non-restricted content only). Digital Video: HDMI with HDCP (NTSC: 480i/480p/720p/1080i/1080p/1080p24, PAL 576i/576p/720p/1080i/1080p/1080p24).

AMAZON.COM


(December 2011) Winner: PCMag Readers' Choice Awards Best Blu-ray Player

"Apple doesn't make Blu-ray players, but if it did, we have a feeling that OPPO Digital would still beat it in customer satisfaction. The small Silicon Valley-based manufacturer of Blu-ray disc players earns a Readers' Choice award, having received the highest satisfaction scores of any company in all of our satisfaction surveys this year. Respondents rated overall satisfaction at 9.5 on a scale of 0 (worst) to 10 (best). That was actually the lowest of its major ratings: Overall reliability was a 9.7 and likelihood to recommend was 9.6. For comparison, the highest rated products in 2011 to date were Apple's desktops and notebooks which rated 9.2 for overall satisfaction. 

OPPO currently only has two products on the market, the $499 BDP-93 and the $999 BDP-95. In addition to being designed to meet the demands of audiophiles and videophiles, both provide access to a diverse selection of content including Blu-ray discs and Blu-ray 3D, as well as a variety of streaming sources, including Netflix, VUDU, YouTube, Pandora, and more."" -- PCMag.com



(November 2010)
Oppo's BDP-93 gives you universal playback of Blu-ray, DVD, CD, SACD, DVD-Audio, and a wealth of digital files, with solid picture and sound quality no matter the format. With access to streaming content from Netflix on Demand, USB and eSATA ports for your external drives, and wide connectivity including dual HDMI 1.4, this player defines versatility.

A universal player with stylish design, ample connectivity, and serious versatility. Click here for a larger image SERIOUS MEDIA SUPPORT
The BDP-93 is ready to play most any disc media. Enjoy the latest and greatest with the Blu-ray Disc and Blu-ray 3D formats (3D television and glasses required for Blu-ray 3D). On the Blu-ray front, the BDP-93 also supports BD-Live (Profile 2.0), with Ethernet/wireless networking and a gigabyte of internal storage; and BonusVIEW, which enables picture-in-picture features while the movie plays.

DVD audio and video are supported, and it'll play Super Audio CD (SACD) in stereo or multi-channel. Users can select whether to output the DSD (Direct Stream Digital) signal in its native format or convert it into PCM.

Add the USB/eSATA connectivity and the list gets longer, with support for DVD, audio CD, HDCD, Kodak Picture CD, AVCHD, MP4, DivX, MKV, FLAC, WAV and other audio/video/picture files on recorded discs.

STREAMING CONTENT
Instantly watch movies and shows streamed to your TV via the Internet connected BDP-93 with Netflix Instant Streaming (membership required) on Demand.

CRYSTAL-CLEAR VIDEO AND UPCONVERSION
The BDP-93 incorporates Marvell's Kyoto-G2 video processor, which delivers a truly immersive viewing experience by rendering video free of noise and artifacts. This goes for all types of content--Blu-ray, up-converted DVDs, streamed content, etc. Enhancement options include video noise reduction, compression artifact reduction, intelligent color, contrast, detail and edge enhancements.

Per-pixel motion-adaptive de-interlacing and advanced scaling transform the standard definition image on DVDs to high-definition output to your TV, with help[ from the Qdeo processing for a clearer, smoother, and true-to-life picture free of noise and artifacts.

Connections to suit most any modern system--dual HDMI 1.4, multi-channel audio, coaxial/optical digital audio, composite/component video, and more. Custom OPPO decoder and Marvell Kyoto-G2 Qdeo video processor. These chips help deliver a truly immersive viewing experience, free from noise and artifacts no matter the source. Two HDMI 1.4 outputs, compatible with the latest 3D equipment and pre-3D HDMI v1.1-v1.3 A/V receivers. 1080P/24HZ HIGH-RESOLUTION VIDEO
The BDP-93 features user selectable video output resolutions, including 480i, 480p, 720p, 1080i, and up to 1080p 50 or 60Hz. The BDP-93 can also faithfully display 24 fps Blu-ray discs for smoother motion and a flicker-free, film-like home theater experience.

SOURCE DIRECT MODE
For users who wish to use an external video processor, high-end audio/video receiver or display, the BDP-93 offers a "Source Direct" mode for sending out content with no additional processing or alteration.

DUAL HDMI V1.4A OUTPUTS
Two assignable HDMI v1.4a outputs are provided, giving you the option of full audio and video output to two displays; or dedicating one to audio and one to video. The BDP-93 supports 3D and Deep Color modes on both HDMI output ports.

HIGH FIDELITY AUDIO
The BDP-93 supports bit-stream output of lossless Dolby TrueHD audio via its HDMI 1.4a output, and can internally decode Dolby TrueHD into LPCM and output via HDMI or the 7.1ch analog audio output terminals (Dolby Digital and Dolby Digital Plus audio formats are also supported).

The BDP-93 also supports bit-stream output of DTS-HD Master Audio, for decoding and output via HDMI or the 7.1ch analog audio output terminals. (DTS-HD High Resolution Audio and DTS Digital Surround are also supported.)

7.1-CHANNEL ANALOG OUTPUT
Individual analog 7.1-channel surround outputs are ideal to connect to a 7.1-channel or 5.1-channel surround sound system. The BDP-93 delivers an incredible sound stage and an immersive surround experience. For users with stereo speakers, the BDP-93 offers a down-mix mode.

For simple and easy connection to more traditional A/V receivers, the BDP-93 features both optical and coaxial outputs for digital audio.

CONNECTIVITY
The BDP-93 is equipped with two HDMI output ports, for versatile installation options. No need to upgrade your A/V receiver to a 3D model--one HDMI output of the BDP-93 can be connected to a 3D TV and the other can be connected to a pre-3D HDMI v1.1-v1.3 A/V receiver. For projector users, you can connect one output to a projector for home theater use and the other to a TV for casual viewing. For a multi-room installation the BDP-93 can output audio and video to two 3D or 2D TVs simultaneously.

Dual USB ports and an eSATA port provide you with options for external storage, so you can enjoy high-speed delivery of your digital files.

Using the included wireless-N adapter or the built-in RJ45 Ethernet port, users will also be able to interact with BD-Live content, watch instant streaming programs from provides such as Netflix, etc., playback contents on their home network, and update firmware to keep up with new Blu-ray releases.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Oppo BDP-93, Remote Control, User's Manual 


3D TECHNOLOGY CHECKLIST
This product is 3D-related. To help you get a great 3D experience, use our checklist below to ensure that you have everything you need. If you have any questions or want to learn more about 3D, we invite you to visit 3D 101--our center for everything 3D. To get started with 3D, please ensure that you have:

A DISPLAY
The first--and most important--item you'll need is a 3D-ready display--whether it be a 3D HDTV, 3D projector, or 3D computer monitor. These displays usually have a higher processing power than older models as they need to display one image for each eye to create a 3D effect. 


A SOURCE
While your display is ready for 3D playback, you still need a device to read 3D content (i.e., a movie or a show). This source can be a cable box with a subscription to a 3D channel, a 3D Blu-ray Disc player, or a PlayStation 3. 


CONTENT
In order to watch 3D, you will need to get some 3D content. This 3D content will come from the source mentioned above in the form of a 3D program, movie, or game. Please ensure that your 3D movies are in the Blu-ray 3D format, as this new format will provide the best 3D experience. 


3D GLASSES
All 3D HDTVs on the market require Active Shutter glasses to create the 3D effect. You will need to buy one pair of glasses for each viewer. Also make sure that the Active Shutter glasses you buy are compatible with your display--for example, buy the glasses from the same brand as your 3D HDTV. 


HDMI CABLE
To connect your source (such as a 3D Blu-ray Disc player) to your display, you'll need a hgh-speed HDMI cable. Cables with this designation--with bandwidth speeds up to 10.2 Gbps (gigabits per second)--will be able to carry the 3D signal without any loss of quality. If you want to get more information about 3D, shop our 3D products, watch videos, or interact with other customers, visit 3D 101, our customer center about everything 3D.






FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Oppo's BDP-93 gives you universal playback of Blu-ray, DVD, CD, SACD, DVD-Audio, and a wealth of digital files, with solid picture and sound quality no matter the format. With access to streaming content from Netflix on Demand, USB and eSATA ports for your external drives, and wide connectivity including dual HDMI 1.4, this player defines versatility.Manufacturer Warranty:1 year warranty

See more
feature_bullets: Universal Blu-ray disc player providing playback for a myriad of video formats on disc or eSATA/USB drives
Dual HDMI 1.4 outputs for multiple displays or separate, dedicated video/audio connections
Supports Blu-ray 3D specifications (3D television and glasses required)
Decoding and individual 7.1-channel output for Dolby TrueHD and DTS-HD Master Audio
Stream content from Netflix and update firmware via your wireless or wired network; Voltage: 100V - 240V, 50/60Hz AC
